nodes.text: Droid Station Frequency 3-7-6-4-3-7 was a classified radio station hosted by protocol droid B6-24 where droids helped droids. The station played in certain areas of Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.
Droid Station Frequency 3-7-6-4-3-7 was created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
